website_summaries.verdict: A premium king bed frame that delivers amazing support for a mattress and headboard.
pros: Compact design makes it simple to set up the frame
Provides 13-inches  of vertical clearance for additional storage space under the frame
cons: Tends to be noisier than similar frames
Mattress may slip off the frame easily

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend It!
customer_reviews.text: Rock Solid and Good Value. Absolutely love this bed frame! Shipped and arrived before expected. Very well packed in a small box and all pieces packed separately or zip tied in groups with plastic and foam. The bed frame is amazingly sturdy and quiet, just as advertised. There's plenty of space for storage underneath. Plus free shipping, I highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This bed frame is amazing, much better than I expected
customer_reviews.text: This bed frame is amazing, much better than I expected. I’ve purchased metal bedframes from Ikea before, which is squeaky and unstable. This one, however, is incredibly sturdy and quite. The metal frame looks nice and doesn’t feel like cheap metal. Besides, it takes less than 30 minutes to assemble, I simply lay it out on the floor and follow the paper instructions, easy and straightforward, all the tools are included. My mattress fits it perfectly, there is a little dip to prevent the mattress from sliding around. Plenty of storage rooms underneath, I store several plastic storage boxes and a laundry basket! It’s definitely a great metal bed frame!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for storage
customer_reviews.text: The package arrived completely open on one side I thought pieces would be missing however everything was still in tact. I put it together in about an hour and a half and put my kids 8 inch memory foam mattress on top. It's great to keep all of their trucks and cars and toys under it and with their mattress I don't feel the metal bars and we aren't using a box spring or junkie board. We may opt to buy a bunkie board in the future to preserve the mattress but it's not necessary at this point. Very sturdy frame and no noise or slipping of the slats. Good construction, great product!
customer_reviews.author: Ali

customer_reviews.title: Can’t use a bed skirt
customer_reviews.text: I think this product is great for what it is. Unfortunately I didn’t realize EXACTLY what it was until I put it together. It is sturdy. It is easy to assemble, it provides great storage underneath. And it keeps the mattress from sliding around. However, it will NOT allow a bed skirt to fit neatly. This bed frame is great for a stand-alone bed that isn’t going to get fancy with a bed skirt. Be aware that the corners are not rounded and do extend beyond the corners of a normal mattress. Had to return it and eat the shipping costs. Oh well. Good product otherwise!
customer_reviews.author: bubba

customer_reviews.title: tons of screws would take a good while by hand
customer_reviews.text: My son and I put this together in about 15 minutes with a drill driver and hex bit! tons of screws would take a good while by hand. This frame is STRONG! hold up an elephant strong. Put a memory foam mattress on it and my son loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Michael Lundberg

customer_reviews.title: Poorly manufactured
customer_reviews.text: Although this appeared well done on first inspection in the box, half of the support beam in the middle had the hooks attached unevenly, and one of the central legs arrived with a split weld joint. In addition, although not complicated to assemble, it was extremely time consuming, as none of the bolts fit quite right, and it required large amounts of pressure to force the screws to through the misaligned holes. I am not sure whether it will be worth it to ship something so heavy back, or to just find a local shop to fix the weld joints, however this the first item I have ever purchased on Amazon that I have been so disappointed with.
customer_reviews.author: John Michael Kawooya

customer_reviews.title: Functional and looks good!
customer_reviews.text: Though we have only slept on the bed frame for the past few days, it seems to be good quality and it looks really nice. Lots of room underneath for storage baskets. The setup instructions provided are definitely not the most detailed, but relatively easy to figure out! We had a tough time with shipping for this order as it had to be returned twice due to damaged package and wrong size shipped but amazon was very helpful and basically overnighted the package to us after they recognized they made a mistake. Will try to follow up with another review after a few months of sleeping on it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: the best so far
customer_reviews.text: This is our 3rd bed frame, we weren’t impressed with the first 2. This one is super sturdy which is what we like the most about it. What we like the least is that it’s a bit bigger than our xl twin memory foam mattress so there’s about 3 inches that is exposed where a footboard would be and the mattress sets in the middle so there’s a 3 inch gap between the mattress and the wall where our kids stuffed animals enviably get lost. If you weren’t paying attention, I could see you stubbing your toes a lot since it sticks out more than expected. Minor inconveniences for such a well made frame.
customer_reviews.author: mike d

customer_reviews.title: Great product - Assembly is a PAIN!
customer_reviews.text: If you are looking for a SOLID Platform Frame - this is 100% the one - I have used some of the other "wood" material ones, and they don't even compare. 1 bit of warning - this DOES require assembly, and if you get frustrated or think IKEA furniture is a pain - they look else where, it is a real pain to put together, but once it is together, you will be happy you purchased it.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: TOTALLY OUT OF SQUARE!
customer_reviews.text: This bed frame is totally out of square! I have been a builder for 25 years and have never seen anything like this. The end pieces are of by 7/8's of an inch each side making the needed 54" @ 52 1/4". It is totally unusable unless I re-drill it with new holes and even then I am not sure about the length as the middle is 75" but the ends are almost 77". I wrote to the company at the specified email but have not had a response. There is no website. After examining I reassembled it and it's fine. The real problem is that there are no real directions and it is easy to mix up the legs.
customer_reviews.author: Sarasota Born

customer_reviews.title: Do not purchase
customer_reviews.text: missing 2 slots, plus the main bar in the middle of bed was not welded straight so attaching to main frame was impossible, had to rig the bed in order for us to use till I purchase another bed frame, was very displeased with this product, plus the large screws were not included in my box. I would have returned this product but I did not purchase the King bed till almost Valentines Day as a surprise, when I came home from work to put this together 3 months after purchase I was real upset to say the least.
customer_reviews.author: Danny H,

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: Really like the sturdiness of this frame. And the ease of putting it together. You just have to make sure if you are building the king, make sure you save those two longest screws for the final part, because the instructions I had didn’t have them anywhere on there. I just left them for last. Also once put together, I banged my foot on the legs more than once, and bought pool noodles to cover them and the length of the frame. Picture added. I recommend this frame. It was a good buy for the price.
customer_reviews.author: A.P.

customer_reviews.title: Finally, a bed that won't self destruct.
customer_reviews.text: This is my 2nd bed frame. The other, despite looking good initially, eventually feel apart. This frame has some obvious differences that I'm sure will give it longevity. Rectangular post that are larger and not round and overlapping corners, and metal slats, make this frame sturdier than the last one. It also was easy to put together. It had included tools, but I used my own and had it together in about 15 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Frederick

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and supportive, yet light enough to move easily
customer_reviews.text: I bought the twin XL frame for a new high density foam mattress, which doesn't need a box spring. I was pleased at the sturdiness of this frame. No warping or twisting upon assembly: even the crossbars, which we inserted last, fit snugly all the way down the frame. It supports the mattress well for a teen boy, and he says he can't feel the support bars. This may be a testament to the quality of the mattress, though. The frame is a well-made and sturdy one. I'm happy.
customer_reviews.author: Googly-Eyed Gail

customer_reviews.title: Good bed frame
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to replace our old-fashioned toe-killing metal bed frame. We have been sleeping on the queen size for over a year, and it is very sturdy. The 12-in. clearance under the bed allows for easier vacuuming. Overall, I am very pleased with the quality of this frame. We did keep our box spring and it fits within the frame. Beware though, the corners of the frame do stick out farther than the bed a bit, and we traded our toe-killing problem to a sometimes knee-banging problem.
customer_reviews.author: Letitia W.

customer_reviews.title: I honestly love it! it came in a week early
customer_reviews.text: I honestly love it! it came in a week early, it was super easy to put together by myself and keep in mind I'm low key weak and skinny. I recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Jackie R.

customer_reviews.title: They NOAH bed frame!
customer_reviews.text: We recently purchased a new foam mattress and needed a new frame. I searched through pages and pages of different ones. It met all of the parameters we needed. It is sturdy, was simple enough to put together, however the instructions aren’t all that detailed. Based on my experience so far I would buy again. Shipping was quick and arrived a day ahead of schedule....
customer_reviews.author: Noexit

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy but hurt my toes all the time
customer_reviews.text: The outer edge sticks out a little further than the mattress, only about an inch, but the placement of the feet makes it easy to bang toes into in the middle of the night.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley C.

customer_reviews.title: This review is so good, the frame will break as soon as I submit it.
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Bit of a pain to put together for me, but as a handyman I'm as useful as a poopy-flavored lollipop. Actually, it was pretty easy to assemble, I'm just out of shape so that's my fault. After screwing the frame together with the hex tool thing, you just pop the slats into place across the frame. The platform is very sturdy and even with my intimidating heft I have yet to encounter any problems or noises, squeaking as of yet. I'm pretty impressed with this purchase; I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jared McFarland

customer_reviews.title: Buy foam noodles to put around the legs!
customer_reviews.text: I just received this frame today so my rating on sturdiness is just based on one day. I would’ve found the assembly part easier if it had written directions along with the pictures but as soon as you get going it’s pretty easy to figure out. Some of the parts do have scratches but that’s to be expected. The frame is a bit larger than my mattress so it can still slide around a bit. Also, i read in previous reviews about cutting foam noodles to put around the legs. I highly recommend doing so! For what I paid I am satisfied!
customer_reviews.author: Allison Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Great frame
customer_reviews.text: This a neat bed frame obviously it's not a fancy one but for me I didn't want some thing elaborate and fancy. It's tall enough to put storage under the bed frame but not too tall that you have to get a running start to even get on the bed. The quality is there and also a big plus no squeaking which was my fear with a metal frame but I can toss and turn all night and not wake the entire family yay!!
customer_reviews.author: Kari

customer_reviews.title: Using a cordless drill with a 8-in adapter and 10 mm socket is loads of help.
customer_reviews.text: The directions and the tools provided are not adequate, a cordless drill is a must with a 10 mm socket to make insulation much easier. Happy with the product bed sets well on it and is very comfortable, mama and I broke it in the same night very comfortable ;)
customer_reviews.author: Russell sheckler

customer_reviews.title: Great product, great value
customer_reviews.text: Waited a while to review. Wanted to see how it would hold up. We are big "active" people. I'm 6'2 300lbs wife is 6'1 185lbs and we have a tempurpedic bed with box springs. This frame has been really durable, sturdy and quiet. I even moved it once, took half way apart and back together, no problems. Probably one of the best purchases I've made.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Gardner

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this to replace the basic bed frame that you can get for like $30. It took my husband and his dad maybe an hour to put it together and that was only because they had to run up to Lowe’s to get longer screws and bolts to attach our headboard. It was super easy to assemble. We currently have it set up with our box springs and it’s perfect! It’s like a brand new mattress. The frame is super sturdy too.
customer_reviews.author: Mandey

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Bed! Excellent Price!
customer_reviews.text: Extremely happy with our purchase if this bed in TWIN size. My teenage daughter loves sleeping on it, and has had no back pain since she started using it 2 nights ago. So glad we went with this option!
customer_reviews.author: Lia1009

customer_reviews.title: I love it, it’s quiet no noise whatsoever
customer_reviews.text: I love it, it’s quiet no noise whatsoever, only problem I have is I ordered a full. My mattress fits but there is about 4 inches of space on the long edge. I checked the box. It said full. Other than that I’m torally satisfied. We but the box spring on the bed and it fit with it on but I’m too short so we removed it. Quiet Easy to build Sturdy/strong Reasonably priced.
customer_reviews.author: Isabel Sorto

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: It took a couple of hours for one person to assemble but it is very sturdy. The only other issue is that there are no cushions to cover the metal corners of the frame.
customer_reviews.author: James R.

customer_reviews.title: Nice and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I wish that the frame would have fit right with the King-size headboard I purchased but the frame was about an inch too wide.
customer_reviews.author: Slayals

customer_reviews.title: Love this bed with room for under-bed storage
customer_reviews.text: This is a heavy-duty bed with clearance for great under-bed storage capacity. I found rolling wood drawers for under the bed, and it works as well as a captain's or mate's bed for organization of under-bed items.
customer_reviews.author: BeachiLady

customer_reviews.title: Poor construction, cheap materials.*****
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE*** I purchased 3 of these bed frames for my boys, after about 8 months of my boys sleeping on these, the middle leg broke were it is welded to the frame.. Now there bed is sagging badly!! I wish i would have never ordered these a waste of money.. I thought they would last a long time since they are heavy duty metal frames..Nope!! Poor construction, cheap materials.
customer_reviews.author: Alisha

customer_reviews.title: Very Strong Bed Frame
customer_reviews.text: Got this bed frame for my boy who is the bed frame destructor. So far so good with this one, it seems to be holding up very well. Also, assembly was simple as I did it by myself in about 15/20 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The bedframe was easy to set up & extremely stable
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bed frame and wondered if it would fit into my existing headboard, it does and looks lovely. The bedframe was easy to set up & extremely stable; plus no need for box spring. It was a pleasant surprise!
customer_reviews.author: Cissy

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: I bought the king size and am very impressed by the quality of this frame. No creaks, no sense that the frame can’t handle my weight (I’m fairly heavy and it would easily support a lot of whatever you might want to do in your bed).
customer_reviews.author: Flotsam Watts

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this bed frame
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this bed frame. Assembly was easy, instructions easy to follow, it's sturdy, and there is ample under bed storage. Very comfortable with full sized regular mattress, no need for a box spring. It breaks down to a very compact size for storage. No squeaked at all.
customer_reviews.author: balala

customer_reviews.title: Worth the pain of putting together
customer_reviews.text: Seems sturdy, had to leave ours when we moved out of state and I was ecstatic when this arrived. A bit of a pain to put together but works great.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Brown

customer_reviews.title: Large gaps
customer_reviews.text: I’ll start out by saying that this is a great heavy duty bed frame. My problem is that there is a large gap between the top/bottom of the frame and the next slat. If you put your mattress directly on the frame as intended, the corner of the mattress gets pushed into the gap and it becomes very uncomfortable. It is currently 2:10 in the morning and I’m awake because of it. The gap also makes it impossible to keep pillows where you want them.
customer_reviews.author: kimbo287

customer_reviews.title: A great buy
customer_reviews.text: My son put this bed frame together with relative ease. It's sturdy and durable. I would recommend to anyone looking for a reasonable priced bed frame.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Strong and easy to put together.
customer_reviews.text: Nice frame. Got for my sons first big boy bed. Strong in am 250 lbs. and can lay on he bed with him for story time and it don't move.
customer_reviews.author: busy bee

customer_reviews.title: ... about 30 mins to put together but is very sturdy and no issues
customer_reviews.text: Took about 30 mins to put together but is very sturdy and no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Sirwilliam

customer_reviews.title: The frame is very sturdy and easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: It comes within a small package. The frame is very sturdy and easy to assemble. It's the right size I am looking for to use it in my guest room. Will recommend it to friends.
customer_reviews.author: Victor

customer_reviews.title: Great for its price
customer_reviews.text: Squeaks a bit but overall a great bed frame for its price. About 11 1/2 inch containers fit perfectly underneath.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Good and sturdy. Much better than our futon which had the bar in the middle. But the futon mattress worked great on it.
customer_reviews.author: grnlily

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, very sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with this product. The only complaint might be the little plastic end caps on the insert bars are loose and some of them are missing, but since that doesn't affect the structural components I don't really mind. 4.5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: IT Guru

customer_reviews.title: Okay but ... ...
customer_reviews.text: I had to hire a man to assemble the thing and then it took him almost two hours to get all the nuts and bolts in and tight. Otherwise it is fine and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Kingsley

customer_reviews.title: It's a good platform for your bed - but don't move it ...
customer_reviews.text: It's a good platform for your bed - but don't move it much.....it broke when we moved it. It still works as a platform - but we had to use zip ties to keep it together.
customer_reviews.author: MacGirl

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Generally when you get something heavy the box is torn. I was pleasantly surprised by the way it’s packaged. The frame is well made, easy to assemble. Glad I purchased.
customer_reviews.author: JULIE BENNY

customer_reviews.title: Hard to assemble
customer_reviews.text: I spent 3 hours trying to put this together and I am still not done. The screws are cheap quality and will give you the hardest time. This product is not worth the price. Stick to ikea and make things easier for yourself. I wouldn’t buy this product again and wouldn’t recommend it due to the cheap screws provided and the weird metal bars. It’s so hard to assemble!! Might return.
customer_reviews.author: Meshael Abusalem

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together and working beautifully. Has stood up nicely to sleeping and other things 😜.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I'm taking a star away as although the assembly is supposed to be easy, it was a pain to get some of ...
customer_reviews.text: as advertised. I'm not sure what else one would expect from a bed frame. I'm taking a star away as although the assembly is supposed to be easy, it was a pain to get some of the screws to perfectly fit.
customer_reviews.author: Ammar S

customer_reviews.title: Returned
customer_reviews.text: The dimensions of this product are NOT as advertised. I purchased the king which was supposed to be 76 inches wide. Actual width is 78 inches. Noah replied the give the ‘interior’ dimensions. Unfortunately, it did not fit my furniture. Also, I did stub my toes several times in the few nights it was up. The other brand I ended up purchasing has recessed legs which are awesome. Noah does not have this feature. Otherwise, very sturdy frame
customer_reviews.author: Perry M.

customer_reviews.title: Liked the frames a great deal
customer_reviews.text: Liked the frames a great deal. They are sturdy and great space underneath for storage. I have two very tall heavy children and they have withstood the test.
customer_reviews.author: CHRISTA FELLS

customer_reviews.title: Should have been easy but it wasn't.
customer_reviews.text: The directions should be more detailed. Put all together and still two screws wont go in with realigning top and bottom and sise to side and putting srews in only halfway before tightening.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: A great platform base
customer_reviews.text: I put this together myself in less than three hours including laying out the pieces. I would suggest this, however, it takes understanding all the parts ahead and being patient. A great platform base.
customer_reviews.author: DEBSTER

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Kind of a pain to put together, but it’s very sturdy and a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Momma

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put together and you can get rid of your box springs!!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together and you can get rid of your box springs!!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly D. Sweeten

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, no squeaking
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy, no squeaking, and easy to put together. Great quality for it's cost. Slid a little on my wood floor, so I slid some cheap rubber stoppers under the feet, and it was fixed easily.
customer_reviews.author: Avocado

customer_reviews.title: What I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: No problems. Wanted twin bed frame that had side legs for strength and twin-extra-long length. Price compared OK.
customer_reviews.author: Sad customer

customer_reviews.title: Bed frame
customer_reviews.text: This bed frame is sturdy and quiet. Does not squeak or feel loose. Very good frame for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Adela Y.

customer_reviews.title: very nice bed
customer_reviews.text: easy to assemble, heavy duty but not heavyweight. Very pleased with it
customer_reviews.author: Suzannah

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: Definitely not a one man job. Got it done in less than an hour with my bf. Little rusty tho but sturdy. I'm satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Arial

customer_reviews.title: No instructions. No screws.
customer_reviews.text: Where are the instructions?? No screws?? Is this a joke??
customer_reviews.author: lg

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and great frame!
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy and strong to put a king mattress right away. Took a few mins to put together but it came with everything and was straight forward
customer_reviews.author: Patricia

customer_reviews.title: Meh, not bad.
customer_reviews.text: The included tools are junk. The instructions are equally bad. Overall it's being a solid bedframe though.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Despain

customer_reviews.title: Durability, practicality and price.
customer_reviews.text: Still early to judge only owning it for a fee months. But it's good easy set up and good price. Worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Orlando O'FARRILL

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: cheap hardware and had to re drill some holes to get together
customer_reviews.author: John McDearmon

customer_reviews.title: GOOD QUALITY
customer_reviews.text: A little tedious to put together but a quality item for a place we spend a third of our lifetimes. GET ONE!
customer_reviews.author: RAY L

customer_reviews.title: The bed is high enough were it provides ample storage underneath which serves as a Godsend for a preteen boy that doesn't really enjoy cleaning or tidying up his room
customer_reviews.text: Works well for my 12 yr old. I figured for the cost, if he ruined it, I wouldn't loose much money or sleep over it. The bed is high enough were it provides ample storage underneath which serves as a Godsend for a preteen boy that doesn't really enjoy cleaning or tidying up his room.
customer_reviews.author: Fishgrease

customer_reviews.title: Love this frame
customer_reviews.text: Love this frame. Great storage under the bed. Good support for the 300+ lbs that is currently sleeping on it.
customer_reviews.author: Abena

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: Horrible my son slept in it 1 night and it collapsed! Amazon wasn’t helpful at all when I tried to exchange it for a different item. STAY AWAY!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jodie Jacobson

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: We’ve had this for about 6 months now and it’s great. It was simple to put together and there is no squeaking of any kind.
customer_reviews.author: P. Miller

customer_reviews.title: good sturdy bed frame
customer_reviews.text: This is a good sturdy, clean lined bed frame. There are no squeaks and is solid. That being said just be aware the legs of the frame are mounted flush with the frame so watch your toes :)
customer_reviews.author: Ann Mck

customer_reviews.title: Excellent bed frame
customer_reviews.text: Very satisfied with this frame. It's sturdy and doesn't creak or squeak. There is a lip that keeps the mattress from sliding. And it looks good with the headboard we already had. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Robbie M.

customer_reviews.title: Assembly is not easy and will take hours
customer_reviews.text: No proper instructions to assemble. Assembly is not easy and will take hours.
customer_reviews.author: pavan

customer_reviews.title: Buy it, now.
customer_reviews.text: Love love love love love this bed! Easy to put together and very sturdy. Put a memory foam mattress on top without needing a box spring.
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: Very weak hollow metal
customer_reviews.text: This bed died today ,the legs broke off from the entire frame.
customer_reviews.author: April

customer_reviews.title: Solid purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Let me tell you. This is a sturdy bed frame. Me and my soon to be wife really go to town on top of this frame and it keeps us above ground going at it. It can take a pounding and keep your mattress snug.
customer_reviews.author: Robby

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: The bed frame arrived on time and took about 30 minutes to put together. All the pieces were in the package and fit where they were supposed to. Sturdy and no creaking. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great value.
customer_reviews.text: Very solid frame. No squeaks. Very easy to put together. Mattress insets so it does not slide.
customer_reviews.author: CF

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Brought several of these for dorm with boys excellent buy and sturdy!
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I got the queen size frame for a 14 inch gel foam mattress. It assembled pretty easy, about an hour by myself, taking my time. It is strong and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Love the Frame!
customer_reviews.text: We are enjoying our new bed frame. It makes a big difference in how we sleep at night, more restful and the frame is quite sturdy. Thanks for making this product available.
customer_reviews.author: Tonya Freeman

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Great, sturdy and very firm bed frame. I’ve had ZERO issues with it. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Marsha Dickson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: A great frame and with a box and mattress on top its high enough for me.
customer_reviews.author: Lil Bear

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble. Surprised to have a 30 lb package delivered by USPS.
customer_reviews.author: R. Wong

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: Slept well after I assembled this. Took me a while. It's been a few months, no noise. Great product
customer_reviews.author: walter r vasquez

customer_reviews.title: Product is described well.
customer_reviews.text: I like the under bed storage we gained. We are using the frame in a summer home and suitcases slide right underneath. Just what we were looking for.
customer_reviews.author: mary e.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice bed. Very sturdy. Simple to put together (with help)
customer_reviews.author: Angie

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed
customer_reviews.text: I got my bed frame today and it came packaged decently. Opened it up and I have NO idea if it needs screws or if they were just forgotten. I also have about 30 something pieces and no directions to put it together. I'm not impressed at all!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Strong!!!
customer_reviews.text: Very good frame holds up well for a 255lb 6'0" man no issues but it does take about an hour to set it up but worth it very strong in my opinion
customer_reviews.author: EDUB

customer_reviews.title: Good frame, but a mofo to put together.
customer_reviews.text: Really sturdy bed frame, but it took me an hour and a half to put it together. Eventually left some of the screws out and called it a night. 😂
customer_reviews.author: Keller Payne

customer_reviews.title: Will recommend platform.
customer_reviews.text: Love the platform, no more squeaks! Just had to add plywood for extra support, would recommend product.
customer_reviews.author: Tonya

customer_reviews.title: Need better direction but great quality
customer_reviews.text: The frame came quickly but was scratched and no writing in instructions! Frame is heavy duty and nice quality. Just shipped wrong and lousy directions
customer_reviews.author: k Wiley

customer_reviews.title: Garbage
customer_reviews.text: Can’t even use this bed frame, because the two end pieces are too short for the rest of the frame. Horrible product, waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is 12"  not 14
customer_reviews.text: This is a 12 inch frame, not 14. It is not 14" off the floor by any measure. Don't know if we got wrong item
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Great product great price lots of storage space underneath very happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A Very Long Twin
customer_reviews.text: It’s a good sturdy frame, my only issue is I ordered this in a twin size and I use have gotten a twin xl. A bit difficult to put together and at this point I refuse to take it apart to exchange it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The bed is at a great height and has a ton of support
customer_reviews.author: Kendra

customer_reviews.title: ... I bought this bag was for it to be sturdy simple bed that would last me a long time
customer_reviews.text: The whole reason I bought this bag was for it to be sturdy simple bed that would last me a long time. It broke at the head of the bed. A piece just broke off. I got it welded...thankfully. Othwerwise I would have been without of a bed frame. It was a hassle having to take the bed apart, get the small piece welded , pay for that and put it back together.
customer_reviews.author: Bianca

customer_reviews.title: Not happy with purchase
customer_reviews.text: The instructions are a joke. One of the middle support bars didn't have the hole drilled in the right place.The company doesn't have a number to contact, just email. Not happy with purchase. Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Williams

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect all around! Solid piece! We got the king size and our very large, thick mattress fits into it perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Walsh

product_meta.title: King Size Metal Bed Frame-Steel Slat Mattress Foundation, Heavy Duty Box Spring Replacement, 14 Inch Platform Bedframe, Black
product_meta.description:
Size:KingTHE OPTIMAL SUPPORT FOR A GOOD NIGHT'S SLEEP

Excellence comes from hard-wearing, heavy duty stainless steel and premium craftsmanship, that's what makes our bedframes remarkable.
Our quality paired with world-class customer service is what makes us the ONLY option for bed frame on the market

PRODUCT DIMENSION
Twin Size: 75" x 38" x 14"(LxWxH)
Twin XL Size: 80" x 38" x 14"(LxWxH)
Queen Size: 80" x 60" x 14"(LxWxH)
King Size: 80" x 76" x 14"(LxWxH)

PACKAGE & DELIVERY

Ship directly to your front door by UPS & FedEx
Small parcel in a compact package, convenient for doors and stairs
100% Recyclable Environmental Protection Materials

WARRANTY

We know you have options here, and we want to make the best choice the easiest one. That's why we offer a 100% Satisfaction Guarantee.
Contact us for a replacement or a full refund if you're not satisfied with our product.
feature_bullets: 3000LBS HEAVY DUTY-Durable steel king bed frame base offers a noise-free, excellent support for your mattress and headboard; no box spring needed
EASY ASSEMBLY-The integrated compact design can be set up in 30 minutes; all tools included
ANTI-SLIP DESIGN-Unique top layer keeps the mattress from sliding, no more irritated slip
UNDER-BED STORAGE-Lifts your bed 14 inch off the floor; offers 12 inch vertical clearance for under-bed storage
5 YEAR WARRANTY-100% money back guarantee; Measures 80 by 76 by 14 inches (LxWxH); weighs 57 pounds
